summary: A day in the life of a man suffering from everyday sexism in a world ruled by women.
cast: Pierre Benezit|Tom Colomer|Josie Borrelly-Llop|Céline Porcel|Jamel Barbouche|Marie Favasuli|Lila Berthier|Adèle Grand|Rehab Benhsaïne|Celia Rosich|Céline Menville|Christophe Robert|Marie-Lorna Vaconsin
keywords: feminist film|male female power struggle|female police officer|policewoman|police
title: Mayoría oprimida
